mapper.select:
SELECT TW.ID, TW.PARENTID, TW.EMAIL, TW.DESCRIPTION, TW.NAME, TW.SUBDEMOID AS subDemo_id, TW.CREATEDATE, TW.PASSWORD, LOGINNAME AS loginName, TW.LASTUPDATEDATE, TW.ISVALID FROM WD_DEMO TW WHERE
AND TW.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_DEMO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WD_DEMO ( ID, PARENTID, EMAIL, DESCRIPTION, NAME, SUBDEMOID, PASSWORD, ISVALID, LOGINNAME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{email}, #{description}, #{name},
#{subDemo.id},
#{subDemo,javaType=java.lang.String},
#{password}, #{isValid}, #{loginName} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM WD_DEMO TW WHERE
AND TW.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE wd_demo TW
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
EMAIL = #{email,javaType=java.lang.String},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo.id,javaType=java.lang.S tring},
SUBDEMOID = #{subDemo,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PASSWORD = #{password,javaType=java.lang.String},
ISVALID = #{isValid,javaType=int},
LOGINNAME = #{loginName,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE TW.ID = #{id}
